member.summary: Translates and scales the using a given .

member.param: A transformation matrix that might include translation, rotation, or uniform scaling. Note that will not return correct results if there are non-uniform scaling, shears, or other unusual transforms in this transformation matrix. This is because there is no way to shear or non-uniformly scale a sphere. Such an operation would cause the sphere to lose its shape as a sphere.

member.summary: The will evaluate to its first key for positions before the first point in the and to the last key for positions after the last point.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.CurveLoopType.Cycle
member.summary: Positions specified past the ends of the curve will wrap around to the opposite side of the .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.CurveLoopType.CycleOffset
member.summary: Positions specified past the ends of the curve will wrap around to the opposite side of the . The value will be offset by the difference between the values of the first and last multiplied by the number of times the position wraps around. If the position is before the first point in the , the difference will be subtracted from its value; otherwise, the difference will be added.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.CurveLoopType.Oscillate
member.summary: Positions specified past the ends of the act as an offset from the same side of the toward the opposite side.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Xna.Framework.CurveLoopType.Linear
member.summary: Linear interpolation will be performed to determine the value.
